name: Remnant Tasset
description: This armor was designed from scratch by the Initiative using Remnant technology. Its servos, microframe computer, and kinetic barrier generators are all dependent on Remnant science and artifacts. This resilient and regenerative hardsuit has an energy surplus, though its internal systems can be difficult to properly monitor.
setBonus: Set bonus (3 of 4): When you roll a Hit Die to regain hit points, the minimum number of hit points you regain from the roll equals twice your Constitution modifier (minimum of 2).

Set bonus (4 of 4): You may jumpstart your shields any number of times. Each time you do, roll a d20. On a roll of 8 or less, your shields malfunction: you lose all shield points and they cannot be regained until you finish a long rest.
features: Once per short rest, as a reaction to taking damage, you may jumpstart your shield regen and immediately gain shield points equal to your regen amount.
